headline: Salesforce Expands Into Defense And Wildfire AI With Long Term Deals
summary: Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) secured a US$5.6b, 10 year contract with the U.S. Army to support digital modernization and AI enablement. The company also launched EMBERPOINT LLC, a wildfire response venture with Lockheed Martin, PG&E, and Wells Fargo. Both developments expand Salesforce's role in government technology and public safety infrastructure beyond its core CRM offering. For investors watching Salesforce, these moves show the company leaning further into large scale, mission critical...

headline: Lockheed Martin Secures Missile Deal And Wildfire Venture Fuels Growth Story
summary: Lockheed Martin (NYSE:LMT) has secured a seven year framework agreement with the Department of War to quadruple annual production of its THAAD missile interceptors. The same agreement will expand production of PAC-3 missile interceptors over the contract period. Lockheed Martin is also launching the EMBERPOINT wildfire technology venture with partners to address detection and response for large scale fires. For investors watching NYSE:LMT, this agreement adds a sizeable, multi year defense...
